snippet: Key departures from the Crimson Tide, notably at running back and along the defensive front, could expose seams, but the team tends to frustrate opponents even when it is rebuilding.
abstract: Future of University of Alabama's football team is uncertain, despite Coach Nick Saban's impressive winning record and his emphasis on player development and recruiting; as many as 17 players that made up last season's team could be leaving either for NFL or other endeavors, and some coaching staff may pursue other opportunities.
lead_paragraph: Key departures from the Crimson Tide, notably at running back and along the defensive front, could expose seams, but the team tends to frustrate opponents even when it is rebuilding.

headline.main: Turnover at Alabama Would Give Rivals a Rare Opportunity to Pounce
headline.print_headline: Turnover at Alabama Would Give Opponents a Rare Opportunity to Pounce
